    新博客成立啦-This is my first post in this blog

    Aug 13, 2015

    这是我的第一个个人博客 This is my first personal blog thanks to github and jekyll

    this python snippet is for code display

    import web

urls = (
  '/', 'index'
)

app = web.application(urls, globals())

class index:
    def GET(self):
        greeting = "Hello World"
        return greeting

if __name__ == "__main__":
    app.run()

    welcome to my blog!
